subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your debt request
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire TONIGHT):
$394,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://lovuikeisowcost.com/
